title: Can someone help me write my biography? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what you mean by “help.” I could give you some advice, perhaps. I would be willing to answer a reasonable number of questions. I wouldn’t be willing to edit or write a manuscript for someone through Quora, that’s how I make part of my living.

In what way do you need help, Andrew? Your Quora friends cannot help unless we know what you need. Are you talking about basic English usage? Or, how to write an autobiography? Or, editing a manuscript? Or simply cheers and bravos? There are professionals, “ghost writers”, collaborators, editors or co-authors who can be hired to help you.
NO! But There are professional writing editors and coaches who could help you with a fee. Last I heard from my acquaintance, the fee ranging from a flat fee (per project) to monthly or hourly fee.
